A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I've spent hours listening to critical reception and fan theories\, and short of a miracle this movie could not have turned out better. It's merely the fragility of old set-in-their-ways \"fans\" afraid of change that cannot adapt and lash out against the movie with its rotten tomatoes score. The way of the Jedi as it was is coming to a close\, and the future is looking brighter than ever.
